named-query.name: queryDynaProcessFormByProcessId
named-query.query: select dynaProcessForm from DynaProcessForm dynaProcessForm where dynaProcessForm.processId = ?

named-query.name: queryActiveDynaProcessFormByProcessId
named-query.query: select dynaProcessForm from DynaProcessForm dynaProcessForm where dynaProcessForm.processId = ? and dynaProcessForm.active is true
